attributes.action: reinstate the use of red diesel for private pleasure craft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stand up to the european commission on this issue & show that this goverment cares about the british people or are we just being used to raise more tax!!!!

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Boat-diesel/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
